name: numerology
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the study of numbers in the belief that they have a special importance in people's lives: Numerology gives individuals a life path number that is reached by a calculation involving date of birth. Currently numerology is used to predict the future and better understand human behaviour patterns.
More examplesFewer examplesNumerology is based on the premise that numbers contain energy expressive of the nine attributes of development.The occult section was dominated by works on numerology.According to the ancient art of numerology, these are the qualities 2 embodies.
